LanguageData.TileAYPlaster.label: Lime Plaster Tile
LanguageData.TileAYPlaster.description: Lime plaster tiles. A basic construction that is relatively quick to lay.
LanguageData.TileAYPlasterSalt.label: Lime Plaster Tile (Salted)
LanguageData.TileAYPlasterSalt.description: Salt encrusted lime plaster tiles. Will prevent snow from forming on the surface and has a slight improvement to cleanliness.
